name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Shanghai Minhang: Support Hongqiao International Central Business District Enterprises to Facilitate Access to the International Internet
On January 8, the Shanghai Minhang District Government issued the "Key Task Division Plan", Article 7 of which mentioned: "Support the business district to establish a cross-border data service center, support business district enterprises to facilitate access to the international Internet. Upgrade the international Internet dedicated channel" and other contents, clarifying the division of responsibilities for the implementation of Shanghai Minhang District.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 10, China Medical Insurance published an article: Recently, someone has sung a swan song for original research drugs. It is time for the original research drug concept to withdraw from China! The withdrawal of original research drug companies from the Chinese market means that their product cost performance cannot meet China's current requirements, so they are abandoned by the Chinese market.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 11, in Nanchang, Jiangxi, a live streamer found the hotel where Li Yixue was under residential surveillance, the "Weimei Hotel". Li Yixue shouted in front of the hotel front desk: "The notice is fake, they drove me crazy." There were also unknown people at the scene who prevented the live streamers from broadcasting.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The 9th Asian Winter Games in Harbin is about to open. A community has issued a notice requiring residents to actively cooperate with the community to register information and apply for a pass.
Local netizens responded: "Harbin is playing nostalgic clothes" "I can't stay at home on the opening day, I will be arranged to stay in a hotel"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Li Yixue revealed in the live broadcast room that she is currently being held in a hotel by dozens of people, with no freedom of life, and that there are many falsehoods in the report. Her father wanted to post a clarification video, but he couldn't. The police also deliberately provoked her to behave abnormally.
Li Yixue also said that on the night of the incident, dozens of people broke into the door and forcibly sent her to a mental hospital.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Since the original "Stars Go Home Plan" was forced to stop updating due to force majeure, we restarted the "Ten Million Stars Go Home Plan" in Google Docs, and our community is responsible for maintenance and operation.
Now, in addition to adding information by filling in the document directly, the victims' families can also submit information through email, X private message, and telegram. Our community staff will supplement the information received.
Document address:
Email submission: xingxinghuijia@gmail.com
Telegram submission:
Private message submission:
1. Anyone can fill in the experience of their relatives and friends in the form to expand the database. Contributors in China can directly send relevant rescue to the mailbox xingxinghuijia@gmail.com
2. The cell content cannot be edited or deleted after it is filled in. Please confirm that the content is complete before filling in the following...
fullContent:
由于原“星星回家计划”被困缅甸求救文档因不可抗力因素被迫停止更新，我们在谷歌文档中重启了“千万星星回家计划” ，并由我们的社区负责维护和运营。
现在，被害人家属除了可以通过在文档中直接填写来添加信息以外，还可以通过邮箱，X私信，电报的方式投稿信息，我们的社区人员会将收到的信息进行补充。
文档地址：
邮箱投稿：xingxinghuijia@gmail.com
电报投稿：
私信投稿：
1、任何人均可在表格中填写自己亲朋好友的遭遇，扩大数据库，中国境内投稿者可以直接将相关救援发送至邮箱xingxinghuijia@gmail.com 
2、单元格内容填写完成后无法编辑或删除，请确认内容完整后再填写下一单元格。如果需要更正，请直接另起一行，如需删除内容，也请联系xingxinghuijia@gmail.com
3、本表格未收集受害人的具体信息和肖像，提供信息时，可以酌情隐去容易暴露身份的敏感内容。
4、本表格所收集信息，任何媒体、NGO等组织均可自由使用，以便推动舆论，增加营救可能。

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The original document was closed at 21:00 on the 11th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 11, a man recounted his experience of evacuating Chinese citizens from Ukraine in 2022. The man said that after the start of the Russian-Ukrainian war, China organized three evacuations of Chinese citizens. The destination of the evacuation was Hungary, but they needed to buy Air China tickets to return home at their own expense in advance, otherwise they could not get on the evacuation bus.
The man also said that two Chinese students were placed in a refugee camp in Germany. Later, the two students chose to return home. They consulted the Chinese Embassy whether they could afford the air tickets and quarantine costs during the epidemic, but were told that it could not be solved. In the end, the German government paid for their return air tickets and quarantine costs.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 12 (Released) Shanghai. A netizen quoted a post on Zhihu, which said "I was chatting in my friend's Huawei M9, and was monitored by the in-car system and warned not to discuss sensitive topics." The netizen clearly stated that it was not his original work. But when the number of likes on the post reached 500, the netizen was summoned by the local police station in Shanghai.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hu Xijin: The most basic tool that fraudsters can use to commit crimes is mobile phone numbers. China's three major operators all use real-name registration. How did those SIM cards flow abroad? How did they pass the registration verification and eventually flow into the domestic communication network? This is a major confusion for the public. Hu believes that China Mobile and other operators need to make a public response.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 11 (Released) In Taiyuan, Shanxi, a 90-year-old veteran of the War of Resistance Against Japanese Aggression had no one to rely on in his later years. He cried out, "Dad and Mom, please come back soon. Your son lives like this. He doesn't want to die at the age of 98."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Henan Village Bank depositors jointly issued a petition letter, demanding the immediate release of Shi Jianjian, a depositor who was detained for asking for his deposits, and state compensation for Shi Jianjian and other detained depositors; and holding accountable the Henan public security, procuratorial and judicial personnel who created wrongful cases. 
At present, Shi Jianjian is still detained by the local authorities on the charge of "inciting an organization". Nearly 100 private entrepreneurs and depositors jointly promised: No one incited the organization.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 11, a knife-wounding incident occurred in Wuyue Plaza, Xinghua, Jiangsu Province. Several minors stabbed another teenager with knives due to a dispute. The injured was then taken to the hospital in an ambulance for treatment.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, a netizen made a video to anonymously report the president of Guangdong Technical Normal University, who was suspected of corruption, violation of democratic evaluation and illegal appointment, and academic corruption by the university’s party committee secretary.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 11, the man said that he did not donate again for the Shigatse earthquake in Tibet this time because he was fined 1,200 yuan for speeding 20 mph over the speed limit of 40 when he was traveling by car through Shigatse last year. The fine can only be paid to the local authorities and cannot be processed on the national traffic management platform. The man questioned the local traffic police: Are you fining for education or for making money? If you still have a conscience, use the fines for disaster relief.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 12, netizens said that her sister Jiang Hongyu, who was studying at Southwest Jiaotong University, left school on December 31 and disappeared by the Tuojiang River because she was insulted by the counselor. Afterwards, the counselor involved only showed up twice and never showed up again. Today, the rescue team salvaged the sister's body ashore, but the counselor involved blocked the parents.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 11 (Release) A man jumped from the Xi'an Drum Tower with a banner to defend his rights. The banner read: "Xingping City Court has not enforced the law for ten years, and the deadbeats are at large. We have no money to pay the mortgage and no money to pay for medical insurance."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 11, a blogger posted a message saying: I have never dared to ask a question that touches the depths of my soul. Is it possible that someone will be in the cyber fraud garden all their lives without knowing it?
Currently, the post has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Beijing News, January 11: A diner said that he spent about 9,000 yuan on a meal at Tokyo Xinrongji Restaurant, but was treated differently by the restaurant's Yin-Yang menu. On the menu of the same price, his expensive ingredients such as sea cucumber, royal chicken, geoduck, etc. were replaced with cheap ingredients. Other people's dishes were "Golden Garlic Geoduck" and his was "Golden Garlic Mixed Snail Slices" 
Afterwards, the restaurant apologized to the diner and refunded the money. Netizens said: Chinese people really should stop cheating Chinese people

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 11, a mother pleaded in front of the camera for the country to rescue her son who was trafficked to Myanmar.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: January 12 (Released) A man posted a video saying that he supports Xi Jinping's reforms to prevent China from falling into the dark era of fake democracy where corruption and privileges are passed around. Although Xi Jinping has always insisted on anti-corruption, there are still stubborn vested interest groups. The man believes that under Xi Jinping's continuous reforms, China will soon surpass the United States and become a top-notch country. At present, the video posted by the man on major social media in China has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 12, Beijing Daily published an article comparing the disaster relief capabilities of the wildfires in Los Angeles and Chongqing, highlighting the superiority of the socialist system.
The article stated that in the face of disasters, the United States' expensive firefighting system often fails, and officials at all levels shirk responsibility and quibble. This year's Los Angeles fire was a complete man-made disaster.
In 2022, the Beibei wildfire in Chongqing was much more difficult to fight than in Los Angeles. Even so, local government officials and firefighters rushed to the front line as soon as possible, with the five-star red flag behind them. With the concerted efforts of everyone, it took only eight days to put out the wildfire. The blood, will and unity of the Chinese people in the face of disasters are extremely shining.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 12, netizens posted comments in the Xinhua News Agency live broadcast room: "Save our compatriots in Myawaddy!!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 12, a woman who returned from China with two doctoral degrees said that her child was studying at Renbei Experimental School in Haidian District. During school, he was bullied by a classmate named Li Mouyun, who used violent behaviors such as choking, throwing, and right hooks, which left the child with sequelae of brain trauma. Not only did she not receive any apology or compensation afterwards, but the school also slandered the mother and son as having genetic mental illness and restricted their personal freedom.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On January 12, Li Yixue posted a video saying, "The content of the notice is seriously inaccurate, evading the main point and talking about irrelevant things. My father's clarification video cannot be posted." Currently, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
The families of the trapped people in Myanmar have created an online document to collect information about each trapped person.
Behind every simple sentence is a family and life that has been completely torn apart.
"Don't look for me if I'm your son in the next life." "The child asked when his father would come home." "Your girlfriend's mother is afraid that she won't be able to wait for you." "Listen to your mother after you leave, and start a family when you grow up." "I'm afraid of missing any harassing calls."
"I've made a mistake and caused trouble for the country." "Should we jump off a building and end it all, but we can't afford to die."
"This life is too hard.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: More than 120 people were killed in the Shigatse earthquake in Tibet, China. According to a report on January 10, the people hung up the portrait of the leader they missed at the resettlement site in the earthquake-stricken area, and the soldiers also helped to move.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The Ukrainian Security Service said one of the two captured North Korean soldiers, born in 2005, confessed that he was misled into thinking he was sent for training rather than fighting. One soldier said he had been without food and water for four or five days before being captured by the Ukrainian army. Both men revealed that they had received military training in Russia before being sent to the front line last November.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Recently, in Shandong, a netizen said, "You have to take a photo with the newspaper of the day to receive the annual 600 yuan subsidy." The picture shows that the newspaper headline reads what Xi Jinping said: "Let the people live a happy life is the top priority."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A blogger said that he received a warning from a lawyer after posting this on social media.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On January 8, a netizen used AI-generated pictures to describe the Shigatse earthquake. The person involved has been detained.
The AI-generated picture of Gaza gained sympathy; the AI-generated picture of "Hollywood sign burned in the US wildfire" became a hot search and won traffic.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Lin Chengjia, former major general of the Kinmen Defense Command, embezzled a government-issued washing machine worth NT$7,990 (about RMB 1,769.34) and mailed it back to his residence in Taiwan. He was sentenced to 12 years in prison for corruption in the first instance, and the second instance was changed to 6 years and 8 months. The Supreme Court recently rejected the appeal and made the final decision.
Chinese netizens said that "he is more frustrated than a village chief" and "We just dealt with a small corruption case of NT$822 million here" and "Is this a big deal?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
In 2018, Wu Xiaoping, a financial expert, said: The private economy has completed its role in assisting the development of the public economy and should gradually exit the market.
Recently, Wu Xiaoping also said: I read the "Opinions of the Central Committee and the State Council on Promoting the Development and Growth of Private Enterprises". This opinion has lofty intentions and profound meanings. I was deeply impressed by the part about entrepreneurship.
